bio:
I am an NFT collector who really enjoy and love Optimism.
I started create a content of the dapp on Optimism on twitter to contribute and spread something good.
contributionDescription: My contribution has been to be an honest user who tells my friends how I feel about the experience when I use any applications on Optimism. I wrote the contents and texts in either Thai or English. Moreover, I really love the NFT communities on OP: Bored Town, Apetimism, Optichads, etc so that I am a strong holder.

contributionLinks.description: I join @subli event for showing my strategy for earning more $OP on Optimism
I did create a content on Giveth to share what I learned on this cool platform
This is how I spread my appreciation and love about Optimism

impactDescription: When I shared my thoughts on Optimism Collective, I consistently approached it with honesty and genuineness. Just as I often relay the positive aspects of life to my friends, I brought that same enthusiasm to the contents. By focusing on the 'good stuff' that I'm passionate about, I aimed to uplift and inspire others.
